Step 1: Parse Data Files

Source: R/threader_parse.R
threader_parse.Rd

Step 1: Parse Data Files

Usage

threader_parse(data_path = NULL, spec_fpath = NULL, verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

data_path

Path to the directory containing the raw data you want to parse.

spec_fpath

Filepath to the .yaml-format spec file

verbose

Optional: If TRUE, prints additional debugging information.

Value

An environment where each key is an input file, and each value is the tibble generated from the data in that file

Examples

all_dfs <- threader_parse()
#> [1] "Parsing /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/threadsheetr/extdata//cp_membership_num/1924-1968_hsssd_cp_membership.csv"
